meanings.sent1: He hazarded his savings on a bet at the race.
meanings.sent2: She hazarded a guess at the answer to the riddle.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel hazarded a leap from one tree branch to another.
meanings.sent4: The explorer hazarded a journey into the unknown jungle.
meanings.sent5: The student hazarded a choice between two equally tempting options.

meanings.definition: To expose to danger or harm
meanings.sent1: The reckless driver hazarded the lives of others on the road.
meanings.sent2: The hiker hazarded a trek through the treacherous mountain pass.
meanings.sent3: The chef hazarded a new recipe with unusual ingredients.
meanings.sent4: The detective hazarded a confrontation with the dangerous criminal.
meanings.sent5: The storm hazarded the safety of the small boat out at sea.
